# Getting Started

## 1.	Installation process

```console
python -m pip install aeda
```

## 2. Usage

### Command line

```console
python -m aeda.car.main --regnumber XXXXXXXXX
``` 

```python
import aeda.car
aeda.car.get_car_from_reg_number("XXXXXXXXX")
```
